## Overview
Chair Cathy McMorris Rodgers, along with Chair Robert Aderholt, urges stakeholders to contribute to the discussion on revitalizing the NIH, underscoring the necessity for reform to maintain public trust and uphold the U.S. legacy in biomedical innovation.

## Key Messages
- The NIH reform framework outlines current challenges and recommendations for improvement.
- The officials advocate for collaborative efforts from scientists, researchers, patient advocates, and the American public.
- Concerns are addressed regarding transparency and accountability, with ongoing investigations into sexual harassment claims at NIH and related institutions.

## Participation
Stakeholders are invited to submit feedback on the NIH reform initiatives by August 16, 2024, at NIHReform@mail.house.gov.
